attributes.action: Make animal sentience a priority in UK law.
attributes.additional_details:
Here are two examples of evidence for the sentience of animals:
http://www.hyd-masti.com/2009/04/love-of-swallowmust-see.html 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gvwHHMEDdT0

Here are two articles providing evidence for sentience:
http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0168159106001110
https://www.livescience.com/39481-time-to-declare-animal-sentience.html

There are many more. Overwhelming evidence for the sentience of animals leaves no room for doubt that they feel as much as we do.
attributes.background: Animal sentience is an issue affecting everyone, from pet owners to farmers, and all whose lifestyle and working practice comes into contact with animals. We elect MPs to take action and make decisions on our behalf. This time, we are asking them to represent those who cannot speak for themselves.
